docna.cdata!:
Peru - Road Reconstruction Project : Loan
            0706 - Loan Agreement - Conformed

display_title.display_title:
Peru - Road Reconstruction
            Project : Loan 0706 - Loan Agreement - Conformed

abstracts.cdata!:
The proposed project would include: (a)
            the reconstruction of selected roads/road sections, (b) the
            preparatory feasibility study and engineering, (c) technical
            assistance for road maintenance and betterment, and (d)
            interest and commitment charges over a five-year period.
